profile:
Nothing is too difficult or too complex for our company. We are a construction partner you can trust. And we pride ourselves on delivering high levels of customer satisfaction and confidence while developing and nurturing long-term relationships with our valued clients. 

Our company is proudly: Fully licensed and approved Tarion new home builder, licensed builder/contractor/ with the city. 

We offer the following services:  New home builds, home additions and extensions, whole home renovations as well as residential and commercial demolition services. Call today for a free consultation!
services: New home builds, home additions and extensions, whole home renovations, residential and commercial demolition services.
specialities: New home builds, home additions and extensions, whole home renovations, residential and commercial demolition services.

profile: Clovercon Inc. is an Ontario-based full service construction company specializing in retirement home facilities, commercial, residential and condominium conversion and renovations. We work with our clients in all aspects of their construction needs: from initial consultation, project management, design-build, alterations, additions, to turnkey construction solutions.
